description: This file declares functions and includes necessary headers for integrating Duktape JavaScript engine extensions within a C/C++ project. It defines external linkage for C++, includes function prototypes for loading/unloading extensions and loading template files, and contains include guards.
external_methods: load_template_file(const char *filename, char** bufout, size_t* lenout, int top)

methods.name: ccsp_extensions_load
methods.description: Loads the CCSP extensions into the given Duktape context.

methods.name: ccsp_extensions_unload
methods.description: Unloads the CCSP extensions from the given Duktape context.

methods.name: load_template_file
methods.description: Loads a template file into memory, returning its buffer and size.
